verses.text: \w Some|strong="G3588"\w* time \w later|strong="G3326"\w* \w came|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w went|strong="G2424"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

\w On|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* walkways \w lay|strong="G2621"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w great|strong="G4128"\w* \w number|strong="G4128"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w sick|strong="G2621"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w lame|strong="G5560"\w*, \w and|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* paralyzed, awaiting \w the|strong="G1722"\w* moving \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* water.
For from time to time an angel descended into the pool and stirred the water. As soon as the water was stirred, the first to enter the pool would be healed of his disease.

\w One|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w an|strong="G2192"\w* invalid \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w thirty-eight|strong="G5144"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*.
